snippet: The latest cases bring the total self-immolations by ethnic Tibetans over the past year to 19.
abstract: Three livestock herders in Sichuan Province set themselves on fire to protest political and religious repression at the hands of the Chinese authorities, in latest example of growing turmoil among ethnic Tibetans in the region.

byline.contributor: Michael Wines contributed reporting and Mia Li contributed research.

lead_paragraph: The latest cases bring the total self-immolations by ethnic Tibetans over the past year to 19.

headline.main: 3 Tibetan Herders Self-Immolate in Anti-Chinese Protest
headline.print_headline: Three Tibetan Herders Self-Immolate in Protest
